member.name: MFVIDEOFORMAT.dwSize
member.summary: Size of the structure, in bytes. This value includes the size of the palette entries that may appear after the surfaceInfo member.

member.name: MFVIDEOFORMAT.videoInfo
member.summary: structure. This structure contains information that applies to both compressed and uncompressed formats.

member.name: MFVIDEOFORMAT.guidFormat
member.summary: Video subtype. See Video Subtype GUIDs.

member.name: MFVIDEOFORMAT.compressedInfo
member.summary: structure. This structure contains information that applies only to compressed formats.

member.name: MFVIDEOFORMAT.surfaceInfo
member.summary: structure. This structure contains information that applies only to uncompressed formats.
